title: (08870) Sitges - 85 Passeig Marítim
description:
Longitudinal parking spaces on a dead end street that leads to a hotel. It is a blue zone for which you have to pay during the day (see photo). There are no signs that parking for mobile homes is prohibited and the police, who constantly make patrols, have said nothing.
I downloaded the parking app (QR code on the parking column) for parking and was able to easily extend the parking space from a distance.
As already mentioned, it is a dead end, which is why it is extremely quiet.
The small tourist train also leaves right next door and you can travel along the entire beach to the busier part at the other end of the bay.
There are also showers on the beach and if you go to one of the beach bars you can also use their toilets.
All in all a top place for day and night.

Beach is immediately below the street and there are toilets and a beach shower for rinsing off sand and seawater. title: (08730) Els Monjos - 6 Carrer Lluís Companys
description: RV Penedès area - Santa Margarida and Monjos els Public area easily accessible from the AP7 and the N-340. This place in the Penedès is part of the Parque del Foix natural space, from which several hiking routes are offered. It is also worth visiting the Molí del Foix, the castle of Penyafort or the CIARGA. Don't miss the weekly Sunday market. The area, which together with 11 other areas belongs to the RV Penedès, is equipped with drinking water supply and discharge of gray and black water. 12 estates that will bring you closer to the beauty of the Penedès.

title: (08860) Garraf - 1B Carrer Estació

title: (08880) Cubelles - 32 Carrer de Rafael Casanova
description: Parking day and night. the only thing next to the train tracks, but we slept well. Mercadona next door.

title: (08870) Sitges - Unnamed Road
description: On the same road, lookout to the mountain and beach. There are several points on the road to stop.

title: (08720) Vilafranca del Penedès - 15P Raval Zona Esportiva
title_short: (08720) Vilafranca del Penedès - 15P Raval Zona Esportiva
description: Stabilized parking not far from the sports complex and downtown less restrictive than the area of the city center

title: (08880) Cubelles - 0 Carrer Empordà
description: 24h laundry, next to supermarket

title: (08870) Sitges - Unnamed Road
description: We ended up here after a steep scary drive up the mountain road. a nice flat parking area with only 2 cars there when we arrived and a view of the sea. the end of the car park is far enough from the road to have some privacy and peace and quiet, with trees for shade and hanging our hammocks. nothing said at entrance about overnight stays, seems ok!

title: (08860) Sitges - 1857 Carretera Barcelona a Calafell, C-31
title_short: (08860) Sitges - 1857 Carretera Barcelona a Calafell, C-31
description: Picnic area with 2 concrete tables, quiet for a short break

name: Camping la Rueda
title: (08880) Camping la Rueda
description: Camping The Wheel. Located very close to the beach, with swimming pool. From the campsite you can go to Cunit or stroll along the Cubelles promenade.

title: (08870) Sitges - Carretera de Castelldefels
description: Place with a magnificent view of the sea and the entire city. Great sunset. Quiet street

title: (08860) Rat-Penat - Unnamed road
description: Public viewpoint very well located and well cared for. Requires studs to level AC. Avoid the place on Friday and Saturday nights, since it eventually forms a bottle of young people. We have spent the night without problems but being Saturday we had people talking loudly until the wee hours of the morning.

title: (08729) Clariana - 35 BV-2116
description: Large area of land to park and spend the night next to the Clariana church. Right in front there are some fields and a playground. Good 4G connection.

name: ElPi Negre | Barbacoa Area
title: (43720) ElPi Negre | Barbacoa Area
description: Spacious and quite quiet place, without noise at night, a bit for the day, since people come to spend the day, barbecue etc. You can spend the day and the night. Only open on weekends.

title: (43881) Cunit - 139 Passeig Marítim
description: Public toilets and outdoor showers. Open in low season too.

title: (43881) Cunit - 179 Avinguda de Barcelona
description: Laundry "La Wash" the area to park those little ones for 6-7m you can still park in the zebrado that there is and you don't bother anyone it has two small washing machines and 9kg and another large one of 19kg and two dryers 15kg and 19Kg.

title: (08798) Barcelona - 13 Carrer de Dalt
description: Very nice and quiet parking lot at the exit of a small town around an old monastery. 2-3 even longer motorhomes can stand here over near. Various hiking trails start from here. We enjoyed the quiet night here.

title: (43881) Cunit - 123 Carrer de Joaquim Mir
description: Parking near the sea, the other parking was closed, it is right in front of the train, without service and 100 meters from the sea.

title: (08859) - 1 Diseminado la Creu
description: On the side of a quiet road. no services.

title: (08860) Sitges - 3V Passeig Marítim
description: Parking alongside the beach. Couple of motor homes and vans are parked here. Next to surfing spot. You have to come early morning or late at night to get a spot as it’s busy. There’s music until around 1am at a local cafe/bar. Dogs are not allowed on the beach but many people walk their dogs on the beach in the morning. There are some outdoor beach showers

title: (08739) Sant Pau d'Ordal - Lugar Finca El Maset, 0 S N
title_short: (08739) Sant Pau d'Ordal - Lugar Finca El Maset, 0 S N
description: Bodega Eudald Massana Access to the farm very easy, paved road until you find a clearing where you can spend the night. There is a passing path next to it, but no one has passed all night. We spent 2 very quiet nights! Views and tranquility guaranteed! WE WILL REPEAT! Toilets are available. But only from 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m.

address.street: Lugar Finca El Maset, 0 S N

title: (08860) Sitges - 5 Carrer Ràfols
description: At 50 meters from the beach behind the bar of buildings in front of sea. Only defect, the line of railway nearby. Pay blue zone since 1-JUL-2017.

title: (43720) L'Arboç - 13 Avinguda del Rei Pere I
title_short: (43720) L'Arboç - 13 Avinguda del Rei Pere I
description: Car park near the N340, ideal for a stopover on the road, either during the day or at night to spend the night. It has good entrances and exits, well located and close to services. Right in front there is a motorhome warehouse that has a service to empty wastewater and fill it with clean water. They also have a service for small repairs and sale of accessories and products for the toilet...etc. Right next door there is a SPART supermarket with very good service.

title: (08860) Sitges - 66 Carrer del Ferrocarril
description: Free parking 50 meters from the beach

title: (43720) L'Arboç - Avinguda l'Institut
description: Institute, School

title: (08860) Castelldefels - 39 Passeig Marítim de les Botigues
title_short: (08860) Castelldefels - 39 Passeig Marítim de les Botigues
description: Paid green area in summer until 8:00 p.m., free from 8:00 p.m. to 10:00 a.m., in front of the beach, quiet, safe, shower on the beach. Sunrise in front of the sea, “celeste” beach bar on the beach from 9:00 a.m. to 11:30 p.m., perfect for campers and wide for AC.

title: (08859) Begues - 11 Carrer Camp dels Prats
description: Begues library parking. Ample car parking. A short walk from the town center and the park with slides.

title: (08732) Castellví de la Marca - 8 Carrer Salvador Morato
title_short: (08732) Castellví de la Marca - 8 Carrer Salvador Morato
description: Very quiet parking overlooking the vinyas. Skate area. Playground nearby. Bar.restaurante.panadería. Motorhome workshop. All close within town. You can start the route to see the vineyard environment and in the background you can see the mountain with its tower on top. In the motorhome workshop you can buy liquid for toilet and since you buy it, it lets you fill the water tank.

title: (08732) La Múnia - 1 Carrer de Montserrat
description: New area for MOTORHOMES in La Múnia. Drinking water and gray water area. No shade (trees will be planted soon). 2 tables with benches. Beautiful views of the Penedès. Routes in Castellví de la Marca. There is a municipal swimming pool nearby, a skate park (soon paddle tennis courts), a bar, a supermarket, other shops and a bakery. Also a Sabadell bank in the center of town. In the town there is a campers workshop and other mechanics and services. GPS: Castellvi de la Marca 08732. Enter the town, towards the municipal swimming pool. Direct GPS commands more complicated roads. Enter LA MUNIA town, look for a swimming pool/school and on the last street is the NEW AC area.

title: (08739) Lavern - BV-2429
description: New area with free services and picnic area, next to Subirats station.

title: (08732) La Gornal - 7 Carrer Quintana
description: Parking with a playground in front. No services. Quiet stop or sleep if you are en route.

title: (08860) Castelldefels - 362 Passeig Marítim
description:
Directly at the beach. Calm and relaxed atmosphere, lots of spaces available and the beach is not as overcrowded as the rest of Barcelona.

There is a train station nearby, the train goes directly into the city centre of Barcelona. (5 Minutes walk)

No service, and there is a height restrictions of 2 Metres.

title: (43720) L'Arboç - Autopista del Mediterráneo
description: Ideal for emptying gray and black water and filling up with water

title: (08859) Begues - 5 Passatge Vallirana
description: Not the most beautiful place but good for one night, plenty of space and tranquility.

title: (08739) Lavern - BV-2429
description: This parking space is in front of a church, the highway is a bit audible but not as bad as on the motorhome 500 meters further at the station.

title: (43713) Sant Jaume dels Domenys - Autopista del Mediterráneo
title_short: (43713) Sant Jaume dels Domenys - Autopista del Mediterráneo

title_short: (43882) Calafell - 244 Passeig Marítim de Sant Joan de Déu

title_short: (08735) Vilobí del Penedès - 74 Carrer Guixeres de Baix
description: ESP - Public space in a beautiful village of Penedès, from which walking and cycling routes are offered, wine tours and having a unique natural area called Parc dels Talls. This was formed in an old plaster which naturally became a set of lagoons. The area, which is part of the RV Penedès network, along with 11 other areas, is free of drinking water supply and gray and black water drainage. 12 points that bring you closer to the essence of Penedès.

name: Mirador de Les Caves

title_short: (08735) Vilobí del Penedès - 25 Carrer Guixeres de Dalt
description: Parking with about twenty spaces, slightly sloping, excellent for visiting the two lakes.

title: (08860) Castelldefels - 6 Carrer Santacana

title: (08739) - Camí del Castell
description: In the car park of Castell Subirats Castle. Good for picnic but too sloping.

title_short: (08733) El Pla del Penedès - 31 Carrer la Creu

Located in a quiet place, without noise and next to the vineyards. The region is part of a network of areas created in 2019 in various villages of the Alt Penedès region, ideal for visiting the entire region, vineyards, cava and wine vineyards, ...

title_short: (08732) Castellví de la Marca - Unnamed Road

title_short: (08770) Sant Sadurní d'Anoia - 20 Carrer Sant Josep

description: Parking with  shadow by trees, with a supermarket 100 meters. And entrance and exit of motorway to 5 km.

title_short: (08770) Sant Sadurní d'Anoia - 42 Rambla de la Generalitat

description: Very quiet free parking next to a hotel, shopping center, etc ...

title: (43820) Calafell - 52 Passeig de la Unió
description: Market Square in Calafell

title: (08736) Barcelona - 101 Barri Nou
description: Amazing spot by the vineyards and olive trees, surrounded by peace and nature with beautiful views to Montserrat. Enjoy a day of trekking, cycling, horse riding or a visit to a nearby winery. Please note there are no services. I am a WSET wine expert and I offer wine tastings so you can learn more about wine and this beautiful area. Visit my website for more information ☺️

title: (08758) Cervelló - N-340
description: Terrain of 4x4 open to all ...... full nature under the pines .....;) Access PL also ..... superb to sleep and calm the night .......

title: (08770) Sant Sadurní d'Anoia - 64P Carrer de Perpinyà
title_short: (08770) Sant Sadurní d'Anoia - 64P Carrer de Perpinyà
description: Streets where you can sleep peacefully in an urbanization, near a Mercadona and bars and restaurants. Ideal place to spend the night and the next day to do a route or visit a winery always with Education and respect for the neighbors who live there.

title: (08770) Sant Sadurní d'Anoia - 28 Carretera de Sant Quintí
title_short: (08770) Sant Sadurní d'Anoia - 28 Carretera de Sant Quintí
description: Gas station, laundry. Sito with space, where you can refuel and also laundry service.

title: (08731) Sant Martí Sarroca - Camí de Cal Possastre
title_short: (08731) Sant Martí Sarroca - Camí de Cal Possastre
description: Space, between the vineyards of the rural road. Quiet and isolated village, although passed by tractors and walkers. There is room for 3 or 4 vans. Many trees that provide shade.

title: (08759) Vallirana - 6 Ronda de la Barquera
description: Large esplanade, it is a large dirt parking lot, it is just behind the area, but it is much quieter, spacious and more level. Next to the sports center and a playground.

title: (08731) Sant Martí Sarroca - 16 Carrer del Berguedà
title_short: (08731) Sant Martí Sarroca - 16 Carrer del Berguedà
description: PENEDES RV AREA - Sant Martí Sarroca [ESP] Public area located in a village of Penedès of medieval origin, from which routes on foot and by bike are offered, visits to vineyards. Highlights the castle of Sant Martí which is located on the hill of La Roca and can be visited. The area, which is part of the RV Penedès network, along with 11 other areas, is free to supply drinking water and to drain gray and black water. 12 points that bring you closer to the essence of Penedès. Public area located in a village of Penedès of medieval origin, from which offers little, by bike, visit cellars. The Castell de Sant Martí, located in Turó de La Roca, stands out. The area, which is part of RV Penedès xarxa, as well as 11 other areas, is free for the administration of drinking water and gray and black drains. 12 points that have more in the essence of Penedès.

title: (08759) Vallirana - 7 Carrer Verge del Roser
description: Motorhome area with free parking, emptying and filling water Service. (The services are at the Repsol gas station opposite) where in addition to refueling you can buy gas. Two drawbacks, it has a slight incline (use chocks) and it is in the middle of the highway (a lot of truck traffic at night). Eye wrong address. It is on Calle Major but is accessed via Calle Verge del Roser.

title: (43880) Calafell - 27 Carrer del Ferrocarril
description: Small shaded lot for night and day. Near the train track.

title: (08860) Castelldefels - 14 Passeig Marítim
description: Free Parking out of season (from 15 october to 1st of may). There are showers for the beach, they are turned on all year round. Water tap about  50m from parking. Free public toilet near restaurant. Recycling just over the road.

name: Nadal
title: (08775) Nadal
description: Private pitch on winery Finca Nadal, without any supply or disposal, you stand on flat asphalt in a corner right on the vineyards. Nice patron who comes over in the evening to supervise his meteo station. Absolutely friendly! We are currently alone, but feel completely safe.

name: Camping Estrella de Mar
title: (08860) Camping Estrella de Mar
description: Expensive, sanitary unheated but clean. 24-hour child care. Access to the center of Barcelona from Place de la Catalunya in 45 minutes by bus. It runs every 20 minutes. Playground for children, tennis courts.
